MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 30-NOV-2020 19:14.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety 5:14PM in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:17PM on 30th November 2020
